page_content: The page focuses on the sustainable promotion of biodiversity in public waters and offers specific training for professionals in various fields.
The page provides information on how to apply for tax relief for companies that serve the economic interests of the Canton of Zurich.
The page discusses the promotion of various plant species in the Canton of Zurich, focusing on biodiversity and conservation efforts.
The page discusses the development and application of the "Sprachgewandt" instrument for assessing language proficiency in primary schools, particularly for students with German as a second language.
The page provides information on how to apply for a reserved domain name in the Canton of Zurich, including the application process and fees.
The page provides comprehensive information on personnel management in public schools, including legal frameworks, responsibilities, and processes.
The page provides a detailed guide on how to apply for financial support for supplementary educational assistance, including the requirements, application process, and necessary documentation.
The page serves as a comprehensive guide on autonomous systems, covering legal requirements, certification, and market entry rules, among other topics.
The page is an English version of the comprehensive guide on autonomous systems, covering legal requirements, certification, and market entry rules, among other topics.
The page offers seminars and training for employees of the public sector on the subject of public procurement, including legal frameworks and procedures.
